thread.section_title: Hotel Memphis - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A great choice in the heart of Roma
thread.title_full: A great choice in the heart of Roma - Review of Hotel Memphis, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: St_fa_i_F
title: A great choice in the heart of Roma
text: In the very center of historical Rome within a walking distance from most sights, a very clean, warm & modern hotel with all comforts, a decent breakfast buffet, good wifi receprion & polite staff. The room was a little small but the price very reasonable for such a great location!
